Transcription for 546188

Come, my dear, you will hear my song,
As it never, never will be.
Come, my dear, you will hear my song,
When the red o'er the tide breaks,
When the fire burns, when the fire burns,
Come, O David, come and watch,
Come, O David, come and watch.
By the hand of ancient Bethel,
He drew some in heaven there.
By the hand of the morning and night,
Come, O God, and bless them there.
Come, O David, come and watch,
Where the world thy heart I greet.
